questions.subject: ComfyUI_API_Manager
questions.question: How do I install the ComfyUI_API_Manager nodes?
questions.answer: Clone the repository into your `custom_nodes` directory. No external dependencies are required.

questions.subject: ComfyUI_API_Manager: API Request Node
questions.question: What are the input fields of the API Request Node?

questions.subject: ComfyUI_API_Manager: Text Prompt Combiner Node
questions.question: How do I use the Text Prompt Combiner Node?
questions.answer: Insert API response data into a text box and use `$attributeName` syntax to insert values.

questions.subject: ComfyUI_API_Manager: Image Post Node
questions.question: What are the required inputs for the Image Post Node?
questions.answer: An image, an object ID as a string, and an API key.

questions.subject: ComfyUI_API_Manager
questions.question: Can I customize the nodes to meet my workflow needs?
questions.answer: Yes, the nodes can be adjusted or extended based on specific workflow requirements.

questions.subject: ComfyUI_API_Manager
questions.question: How can I contribute to the ComfyUI_API_Manager package?
questions.answer: Submit a pull request or open an issue to report improvements or bug fixes.
